function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low compliance with mitigation policies","Impact":"Increase in COVID-19 cases and failure to contain the infection","Mitigation":"Increase enforcement of compliance measures, provide public education and awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, surveillance technology, and monitoring systems","People":"General public, individuals not adhering to guidelines","Owner":"Government, health authorities, community leaders"},{"Description":"Inadequate testing policy","Impact":"Failure to identify and isolate cases, leading to increased spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Expand testing capacity, implement rapid testing, and improve accessibility to testing facilities","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, mobile testing units, and testing infrastructure","People":"Individuals at risk of infection, communities with limited access to testing","Owner":"Health authorities, government, private healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Inconsistent mitigation policies and responses","Impact":"Unpredictable trajectory of infections, difficulty in controlling the spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Establish consistent and evidence-based guidelines, coordinate responses at state and federal levels","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, modeling software, and communication platforms","People":"Healthcare professionals, policymakers, and public health agencies","Owner":"Government, public health agencies, research institutions"}]}
